thread.title: New diverse art display opens at New York's Gracie Mansion
thread.title_full: New diverse art display opens at New York's Gracie Mansion

title: New diverse art display opens at New York's Gracie Mansion
text: > Entertainment New diverse art display opens at New York's Gracie Mansion Kalia Brooks, curator for Gracie Mansion's exhibition, "Windows On The City," prepares to talk about a 1700 pipe tomahawk, right, that belonged to an Iroquois warrior chief, during a press tour of the exhibition, Friday, Oct. 23, 2015, in New York. Mayor Bill de Blasio and his wife, Chirlane McCray, are installing new artwork at Grace Mansion that they say depicts the city's full history and meant to capture life in New York in 1799 when the mansion was built. (AP Photo/Bebeto Matthews)
